CustomField.description: Use this rich text field to enter a description of the layout. Note additional details (such as number of columns, tiles [yes/no/location/number], progress, nav, content, header, footer, visible/hidden).
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enter a description of the layout, noting additional details (such as number of columns, tiles [yes/no/location/number], progress, nav, content, header, footer, visible/hidden).
CustomField.label: Layout Description
